TEXT.S: François Hollande I 1954 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 12 a romi'ad masofoc ci François Hollande, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no France anini i ci François Hollande, patirengan a romi'ad i 2012 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 15 a romi'ad. His presidential term ended on 14 May 2017.
